attributes.action: Failure to support all the residents Rushmoor and controll it's population
attributes.additional_details:
We the people of Rushmoor wish to highlight and voice our concerns about failure of the government to financially and socially support our borough with the influx of ex Gurkha's and their dependants.

We are asking for more support for the whole community to aid with intergration and cope with the massive pressure put on public services that a 10% rise in the local population has caused.

 The whole community is feeling the strain and it is both British and Nepalese that are suffering due to the lack of forsight and support and controll the population of Rushmoor by dispersing ex Gurkha's around the country.
